statements: SELECT * FROM return_products;
SELECT product_name, return_date FROM return_products;
SELECT id, product_name, return_date, reason_for_return FROM return_products WHERE reason_for_return IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM return_products WHERE return_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT id, product_name, return_date FROM return_products ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM return_products WHERE return_date >= '2022-01-01' AND return_date <= '2022-03-31';
SELECT product_name, reason_for_return FROM return_products WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, return_date FROM return_products WHERE product_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, reason_for_return FROM return_products WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) AND reason_for_return IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM return_products ORDER BY return_date ASC, id DESC;
SELECT * FROM returned_products;
SELECT product_name, return_reason FROM returned_products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM returned_products WHERE return_reason='Damaged';
SELECT product_id, product_name, return_reason FROM returned_products WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, return_reason FROM returned_products WHERE return_reason='Missing' ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, return_reason FROM returned_products WHERE return_reason = 'Damaged'
SELECT * FROM return_reasons WHERE reason_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT product_name, return_reason FROM returned_products ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_returns FROM returned_products WHERE return_reason LIKE 'Defective%'
SELECT product_id, reason_description FROM returned_products JOIN return_reasons ON returned_products.product_id = return_reasons.reason_id
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, return_count FROM products ORDER BY return_count DESC;
SELECT product_name, reason_description FROM products JOIN return_reasons ON products.product_id = return_reasons.reason_id;
SELECT product_name, return_date FROM products JOIN product_returns ON products.product_id = product_returns.product_id WHERE product_returns.return_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_category FROM products WHERE return_count > 0;
SELECT product_name, return_count, product_category FROM products WHERE product_category='Electronics';
SELECT * FROM product_returns WHERE return_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT pr.product_name, rr.reason_description FROM products pr JOIN product_returns prr ON pr.product_id = prr.product_id JOIN return_reasons rr ON prr.reason_id = rr.reason_id;
SELECT * FROM returned_products;
SELECT product_id, return_reason FROM returned_products WHERE return_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT p.product_id, r.reason_description, t.return_quantity FROM returned_products p JOIN return_reasons r ON p.product_id = r.reason_id JOIN product_tracking t ON p.product_id = t.product_id;
SELECT * FROM product_tracking WHERE return_quantity > 5 ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT p.product_id, q.quality_rating, q.feedback FROM returned_products p LEFT JOIN product_quality q ON p.product_id = q.product_id;
SELECT * FROM returned_products WHERE return_date = '2022-10-05';
SELECT product_id, return_reason FROM returned_products WHERE return_date > '2022-10-01' ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, reason_description FROM returned_products JOIN return_reasons ON returned_products.product_id = return_reasons.reason_id;
SELECT tracking_id, product_id, return_date FROM product_tracking WHERE return_quantity > 5 ORDER BY return_date ASC;
SELECT quality_id, product_id, quality_rating FROM product_quality WHERE quality_rating >= 4 AND feedback IS NOT NULL ORDER BY quality_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM returned_products
SELECT product_id, return_reason FROM reasons_for_return
SELECT product_name, manufacturer_name, product_category FROM product_details
SELECT product_id, quality_score, quality_comments FROM product_quality ORDER BY quality_score DESC
SELECT trend_id, trend_date, trend_category, trend_description FROM return_trends ORDER BY trend_date
SELECT * FROM returned_products WHERE product_id = 1000;
SELECT product_id, return_reason, return_date FROM returned_products WHERE return_type = 'Refund' ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer_name, manufacturer_date FROM product_details WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' LIMIT 10;
SELECT quality_score, quality_comments FROM product_quality WHERE product_id = 2000 AND quality_score > 8;
SELECT * FROM return_trends WHERE trend_category = 'Fashion' AND trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
